headline: Mitigating a 754 Million PPS DDoS Attack Automatically
keywords: DDoS, Security, Gatebot, Attacks, SYN, Network Layer
description: On June 20, Cloudflare automatically mitigated a highly volumetric DDoS attack that peaked above 754 million packets per second. The attack was part of an organized four day campaign starting on June 18 and ending on June 21.
